text: mætiyen da pasu va sukranu binduvakin da pasu va elli pavatina kætiyakin da numbala mævve ohuya. pasu va ohu numbala bilideku vasayen bæhæra karayi. pasu va numbala vædiviyata patvannatat pasuva vayovrddhabhavayata patvannatat ohu salasvayi. numbala aturin ita pera maranayata pat karanu labannan da veti. numbala vataha gata hæki vanu pinisa (mese) niyamita kalayak dakva numbala langa vannata ida hariyi
